post.title: strom (ugh) to iphone4
post.content: heya, so i've finally decided on iphone, i currently have a bb storm 1 and i have about 17months left on my contract. i have unlimited data on my bb storm. i'm thinking of purchasing an iphone from apple and continuing my contract with telus. is that possible? ...of course, unless i weasle a subsidized iphone4 from telus for another 3 years.... cheers.
